title: Shakaijin Yuri Anthology
description:
A Yuri anthology of working adults.

Volume 1: Ano Musume to Me ga Au Tabi Watashi wa Shakaijin Yuri Anthology
[spoiler]
[b]Cover Illustration[/b]: Harukawa Haru. [b]Subsequent stand-alone illustrations[/b]: Yukiko, Saki Hajime
Story 1 Masking Lady (Harukawa Haru)
Story 2 About the women in the company (Mikanuji)
Story 3 Everyone's Missing Out (Irua)
Story 4 Fish and Water (Kanarashi)
Story 5 Meter Stop (Seta Seta)
Story 6 Waiting at the Blue Bells (Kuwabara Tamotsu)
Story 7 Good job (Fuyume Saya)
Story 8 Gachinko Alumni Association (Esu Esu)
Story 9 Rainy day-dream (Oku Tamamushi)
Story 10 Oblivious you (Mizuasou)
Story 11 In my studio apartment palace (Satsumaage)
Story 12 Saccharine Beauty (Suzuki Senpai)
Story 13 I want to make my work senpai moan!(Kurukuruhime)
Story 14 Hand-Delivered Love Letter (Yuki Yukiko)
[/spoiler]

Volume 2: Anata no Soba ni Iru to Watashi wa Shakaijin Yuri Anthology
[spoiler]
[b]Cover Illustration[/b]: Saki Hajime [b]Subsequent stand-alone illustrations[/b]: Kiriyama Haruka,  Koruse
Story 1 Someday you too (Seo Minosuke)
Story 2 Best Dishes (irua)
Story 3 Of the same Love (Kuwabara Tamotsu)
Story 4 Kira Kira Trap (Pyaa)
Story 5 When Your Night Ends (Harukawa Haru)
Story 6 Cabaret Girl and Corporate Slave (Hisakawa Haru)
Story 7 Love at first voice + Renko (Mizuasou)
Story 8 The day you left the company (Mikanuji)
Story 9 Bye Bye, Shithead + With you, after then (Mimidori)
Story 10 Human Dog&Cat (Seta Seta)
Story 11 Store manager I quit my Job! + The day Tanaka-san quit (Suzuki Senpai)
Story 12 Uneven wedding rings (Kurukuruhime)
Story 13 Someday to you (Yuki Yukiko)
[/spoiler]

Volume 3: White Lilies in Love Hana kaoru toki, Anata wa Shakaijin Yuri Anthology
Volume 4: White Lilies in Love Watashi ga Yoishireru no wa, Natsu no Hizashi to Anata dake Shakaijin Yuri Anthology
Volume 5: White Lilies in Love Akane Sasu Koishin wo, Akaku Somete Hoshii no Anata ni Shakaijin Yuri Anthology

matches.title: Watashi no Muchi na Watashi no Michi
The Girl That Wants To Become Cuter, and the Clothing Shop Woman
